arts.ttl: Exeter City 0 Stockport County 2 - Flat Grecians easily beaten by promotion-chasers - Devon Live
arts.sum: Wootton doubled the lead with 20 minutes gone when he tapped home from close range as City’s appeals for an offside flag in the build-up were waved away. It was a flat afternoon as City never remotely looked like getting anything out of the encounter after rarely threatening the visitors’ goal, with a Reece Cole deflected free-kick as close as they came.

arts.ttl: Two Kyle Wootton goals help Stockport maintain promotion push with win at Exeter
Exeter City hope for continued attacking improvement as Stockport County visit
arts.sum: IF Gary Caldwell wanted to see an improvement in Exeter City’s attacking play at Barnsley on Tuesday night, then he certainly got it, as the Grecians responded to last week’s home loss to Wrexham with a superb 2-1 win at Oakwell. “We always review games, we always look to make improvements and we know against the better teams in this league we have to be at our very best.

arts.ttl: ‘Very similar’ – Stockport County compared to Wrexham by League One boss
arts.sum: Stockport County’s rise up the football pyramid has been ‘very similar’ to Wrexham’s, Exeter City boss Gary Caldwell… The post ‘Very similar’ – Stockport County compared to Wrexham by League One boss appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Preview: Exeter City vs. Stockport County - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Exeter City and Stockport County, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Exeter City back to winning ways and show character to beat Barnsley
arts.sum: Exeter appeared to have doubled their lead through Ed Turns on the stroke of half-time when Ed Turns headed home, only to see the goal ruled out dubiously for a foul by Caleb Watts in the build-up. Josh Magennis’ goal in the final ten minutes ensured the Grecians came away with all three points and move closer to a fourth straight season in League One with a 2-1 win.

Exeter are heading towards safety after beating Barnsley to move nine points clear of the relegation zone. A second straight win and fourth in seven would have the Grecians really start planning for a...
